documentation.text: @dev ERC777 interface with methods only used in voting contract.

createProposition(string,string,uint256,.details: Create new proposition struct and save it to list of propositions.

params.endBlock: block on which proposition is no longer active
params.startBlock: block on which proposition is active for voting
params.title: proposition title

getPropositionInfo(uint256).details: These do not include votes related data.

getPropositionStatus(uint256).details: Voting status can be: - pending if proposition is not available for voting, - active if proposition is currently available for voting, - succeeded if voters voted for support, - failed if voters voted against.

getPropositionVotes(uint256).details: Voting info includes: - total number of votes, - number of support votes, - number of against votes and - number of reserved votes.

getNumberOfPropositions().notice: Get total number of all propositions in existance.

getTokenAddress().notice: Get the address of token contract.

vote(uint256,uint8).notice: Vote on proposition by giving proposition id and your vote.
